title: realign phone for faster charging - pixel stand with pixel 5
content:
Hi,
I just got Pixel 5 and Pixel Stand.
After the phone is fully charged (without any issue), a red message appears on the phone saying 'realign phone for faster charging' and constantly switching with 'charged'. It isn't very pleasant, especially since my phone and stand are on my desk in front of me. If I put the phone horizontally on the stand, I will not have this issue.
Is there any fix for this issue?
Thank you

UPDATE: I just notice Stand make a chirping noise while charging!
